CDX Example

Two carbon atoms bonded by a single bond with a text caption stored as CDX:

Download CBndCTxt.cdx

This is a listing showing the structure and contents of a CDX file which contains a pair of carbon atoms connected by a single bond with a text string under them.

This CDX file has a top-level Document object which contains a bunch of properties ("Creating Program" through "MacPrintInfo") and a single object ("Page") with ID 1.'

The Page object contains a Text object with ID 7 and a Fragment object with ID 8.

The Text object contains several properties ("Text" through "Front-to-back order").

The Fragment object contains two Node objects with IDs 2 and 3, and a Bond object with ID 4

Each Node object contains several properties ("Node Type" through "Node_LabelDisplay") and a Text object.

Each Text object contains several properties ("Text" through "Front-to-back order").

The Bond object contains two properties ("Begin & End node #s" through "Front-to-back order"). The "Begin & End node #s" property contains the IDs of the two Nodes connected by the Bond.

------------------
Document ID 0
| *Creating program: ChemDraw 5.0
| *Name: CBndCTxt.cdx
| *Bounding box (ltrb): (87.00,105.00,181.00,149.00)
| *Window position: (206.00,167.00)
| *Window size: (375.00,571.00)
| *Bond spacing: 120
| *Bold width: 4.00
| *Bond length: 30.00
| *Line width: 1.00
| *Margin width: 2.00
| *Hash spacing: 2.70
| *Chain angle: 120.0 degrees
| *Fractional widths: Use
| *FontTable: 2 fonts: Arial[intern#3/encoding=4E4], Times New Roman[intern#4/encoding=4E4]
| *ColorTable: 10 colors: BLACK, WHITE, WHITE, BLACK, RED, YELLOW, GREEN, CYAN, BLUE, MAGENTA
| *MacPrintInfo: [120 bytes]
| Page ID 1
| | Text ID 7
| | | *Text: "Ethane without Hs" Styles[ChStart/Font/Face/Size/Color]=[0/4/0/12.0/3]
| | | *Line height: 1
| | | *Justification: Left
| | | *2D Position: (89.00,147.00)
| | | *Bounding box (ltrb): (89.00,138.00,179.00,147.00)
| | | *Front-to-back order: 5
| | Fragment ID 8
| | | Node ID 2

| | | | *Front-to-back order: 0
| | | | *Node_LabelDisplay: 3 [ 1 bytes]
| | | | Text ID 6

| | | | | *Justification: Left
| | | | | *Label alignment: Right

| | | | *Node Type: Element

| | | | *Node_LabelDisplay: 1 [ 1 bytes]
| | | | Text ID 5
| | | | | *Text: "C" Styles[ChStart/Font/Face/Size/Color]=[0/3/96/10.0/3]
| | | | | *Justification: Left
| | | | | *Label alignment: Left
| | | | | *2D Position: (121.90,113.75)
| | | | | *Bounding box (ltrb): (123.00,107.00,128.00,114.00)
| | | | | *Front-to-back order: 3
| | | Bond ID 4
| | | | *Begin & End node #s: 2, 3
| | | | *Front-to-back order: 2
